mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_id qnaId, q.qna_title qnaTitle, q.member_id memberId, m.member_name memberName, q.create_date createDate, q.last_update lastUpdate FROM qna q JOIN member m ON q.member_id = m.member_id

SELECT q.qna_id qnaId, q.qna_title qnaTitle, q.member_id memberId, m.member_name memberName, q.qna_content qnaContent, q.create_date createDate, q.last_update lastUpdate FROM qna q JOIN member m ON q.member_id = m.member_id WHERE q.qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qna_title = #{qnaTitle}, qna_content = #{qnaContent}, last_Update = NOW() WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_title, qna_content, member_id, create_date, last_update) VALUES (#{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{memberId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT qc.qna_comment_id commentId, qc.qna_id qnaId, qc.qna_comment qnaComment, qc.member_id memberId, m.member_name memberName, qc.create_date createDate, qc.last_update lastUpdate FROM qna_comment qc JOIN member m ON m.member_id = qc.member_id WHERE qc.qna_id = #{qnaId}
